items.title: Facebook paid £4.1m in UK tax last year
items.description: Facebook says it paid £4.16m in corporation tax in the UK last year, a sharp increase on the previous year, when there was an outcry at how little it had paid.
items.content: Facebook says it paid £4.16m in corporation tax in the UK last year, a sharp increase on the previous year, when there was an outcry at how little it had paid.

items.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 7: Second 'safe' replacement catches fire
items.description: A second replacement Samsung Galaxy Note 7 device has caught fire, US media report, following a mass recall of the phones in September.
items.content: A second replacement Samsung Galaxy Note 7 device has caught fire, US media report, following a mass recall of the phones in September.

items.title: CEO Secrets: Shazam boss Rich Riley on success secrets

items.title: Digital daughter

items.title: Plotting success
items.description: There are three main issues the UK needs to address if it is going to build a technology company on the scale of Google, according to a group of entrepreneurs.

items.title: Backpage website head Carl Ferrer faces sex charges
items.description: Carl Ferrer, head of small ads website Backpage.com has been arrested on charges of pimping, says the California Attorney General.

items.description: A credit card with an ever-changing security code is being launched in France and may also come to the UK.

items.title: Lady Gaga: Clips from new album 'leak' on Amazon

items.title: Twitter shares plunge by a fifth
items.description: Shares in social media website Twitter plunge by a fifth on Thursday amid worries about a lack of takeover interest.

items.title: How the street light got a hi-tech makeover

items.title: Valve ordered to tackle 'skin betting'

items.title: Spotify ads 'launched virus pop-ups'

items.title: Hack warnings prompt cyber 'security fatigue'
items.description: Endless warnings have given people "security fatigue" that stops them keeping their devices safe, suggests a study.

items.title: Yahoo 'scanned emails to help FBI hunt terrorists'

items.title: NSA government contractor 'stole classified files'

items.title: Jetpack pilot in flight across Royal Docks

items.title: Fujitsu shares jump on takeover rumours

items.title: Samsung takes over AI pioneer and creators of Apple's Siri
